title: How to Summon Herobrine on Minecraft PE Using a Mod

steps.title: Download and install the latest version of Minecraft on Android, iOS, or PC.
steps.content: Download and install the latest version of Minecraft on Android, iOS, or PC. Modern mods for Minecraft PE come in the form of Add-ons and can be installed and used on all supported platforms.

steps.title: Find a website with a mod you like for Herobrine.
steps.content: Find a website with a mod you like for Herobrine. There are many other sources for Minecraft PE mods, simply enter Herobrine mod for Minecraft PE in Google search and find the one you need. The most popular websites dedicated to Minecraft PE are: https://modbay.org/ https://mcpedl.com/

steps.title: For example, on ModBay, one popular mod is The Haunted by Herobrine Addon by DolphinMasterMB.
steps.content: For example, on ModBay, one popular mod is The Haunted by Herobrine Addon by DolphinMasterMB. Find the mod you like and download its file.

steps.title: Go to the download section and download the file in your preferred format.
steps.content: Go to the download section and download the file in your preferred format. (e.g. mcaddon).

steps.title: Open the Files app and locate the downloaded file.
steps.content: Open the Files app and locate the downloaded file. Usually, downloaded files from websites are saved in the Downloads folder.

steps.title: Tap on the file to launch Minecraft and start importing the addon.
steps.content: Tap on the file to launch Minecraft and start importing the addon. Wait for the import to complete.

steps.title: Go to edit an existing world or create a new one.
steps.content: Go to edit an existing world or create a new one. It is recommended to use addons only in new worlds to avoid any potential issues with existing ones. Open Experiments and enable the experimental options for the mod to work correctly. It is recommended to activate all options.

steps.title: Go to Behavior Packs section and select Available.
steps.content: Go to Behavior Packs section and select Available. Find the imported mod and activate it.

steps.title: Go to Resource Packs section.
steps.content: Go to Resource Packs section. Repeat the same steps as the previous one and activate the Resource Pack of the addon.

steps.title: Launch the Minecraft world and make sure the mod is working!
steps.content: Launch the Minecraft world and make sure the mod is working! Before using it, it is advisable to familiarize yourself with its features and functions.
